DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Two Multi-Drug Therapies HIV-Infected Patients Who Have Never Received Anti-HIV Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: In open-label study antiretroviral-naive patient randomize one two drug regimen : Arm I : 141W94 ( amprenavir ) , 1592U89 ( abacavir ) , Combivir ( 3TC/AZT tablet ) . Arm II : Nelfinavir Combivir .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must : CD4 count > 50 . HIV RNA > 5,000 . No active AIDS ( exclude CD4 count < 200 ) . Ability comply dose schedule protocol evaluation . Prior Medication : Allowed : 3TC protease inhibitor , < 1 week therapy . Other nucleoside analog , < 4 week therapy . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : Active AIDS ( include CD4 count < 200 ) . Malabsorption syndrome affect drug absorption . Concurrent Medication : Excluded : Enrollment investigational drug protocol . Prior Medication : Excluded : Nonnucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor .
